1412: A. This policy applies only to accidents and losses which occur: 1. During the policy period as shown in the Declarations; and 2. Within the policy territory.
1413: B. The policy territory is: 1. The United States of America, its territories or possessions; 2. Puerto Rico; or 3. Canada.
1414: This policy also applies to loss to, or accidents involving, "your covered auto" while being transported between their ports.
